review: Really fast paced and takes some time to understand whats going on, i'm not good at the game and it needs some skill and a lot of luck but is pretty fun

author: {'steamid': '76561198038457709', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1673468062}
review:
Pros:
- Simple controls for either keyboard or controller.
- Simple game mechanics.
- Perfect for just killing time.

Cons:
- Music is repetitive.
- No training mode (it's trial by fire)

Notes:
Whilst I don't personally enjoy this kind of game, I can easily see many others enjoying it, so despite my personal feelings, I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a 'time killer' game that you can just jump in with little loading time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064983931', 'num_games_owned': 4079, 'num_reviews': 447, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1599460119}
review: Not terrible. It's just a high score kind of game so your mileage will vary. Pretty difficult due to how fast it is. Overall there isn't enough to it for me to recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130562680', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1556382200}

author: {'steamid': '76561198162538748', 'num_games_owned': 607, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1478616885}
review: 很好玩。比collider好玩多了。這個遊戲是 HELP: THE GAME組合包中的其中一款。所有遊戲所得都全數用在資助戰火中兒童的需求與照料。遊戲中，你繞著一個太陽快速旋轉移動，太陽有著引力會把你吸進去，你可以用滑鼠左鍵來讓自己抵抗引力往外圈飛去，整個移動軌跡應該說是螺旋的軌跡。遊戲的目的就是得高分，吃到綠色物體得分，撞到紅色物體死亡，還有七種power up可以吃，快速連續吃到分數會有combo加成。遊戲有難度，要控制自己的軌跡不容易，而且因為是螺旋移動且速度快，除了眼睛視野要大，還要快速感覺出要加速多少或是墜落多少，才能閃過紅色或是吃到綠色物體。比起線性閃躲類型的遊戲，有著不同的張力感。玩的人很少，所以很容易可以進到世界百大中。

author: {'steamid': '76561198048285465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1483769410}
review:
Been playing this game for almost an hour now, and let me tell you how fast-paced this game is.

I definitely recommend it for anyone out there who digs reflex-based games or is subscribed to /r/sweatypalms.

It's definitely repetitive, but that's a good thing in this case. You're on a fixed map that keeps getting filled with enemies and bonuses, and it's up to you to beat back the horde and collect as many points as you can.

To tell the truth, I bought this game because it only had on review, and it was negative. I had to give it a fair chance, and what do you know? It kicks ass. I put it right next to Agar.io, Slither.io, and Unpossible. (Also very gratifying since I made the #3 spot on the leaderboard in under an hour hahaha suck it...)

author: {'steamid': '76561198180063413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1469666689}
review: The game is polished and looks nice, but I don't think it's quite for me. It's super fast-paced and confusing, and I think the game would've been way better on a linear instead of circular pattern, because the motion made my head spin after only a few minutes playing it. If you want a challenge, then I reccomend this game to you, but if you want a casual game, and expecially if you get motion sick easily, I'd say keep looking.
